items.title: Puka Nacua is the first month MVP
items.summary: A wide receiver has never won the NFL MVP award and that’s not going to change this year, but Puka Nacua has been the most valuable player for any team in September and that was proven once again on Sunday during the Rams’ 27-20 win over the Colts. Nacua caught 13 passes for 170 yards, […]

items.title: 5 takeaways from Rams win over Colts in Week 4
items.summary: The Los Angeles Rams pulled off a big win in Week 4 over the previously unbeaten Indianapolis Colts.

items.title: Tutu Atwell makes a late 88-yard TD catch, and Rams rally past Colts 27-20 after Mitchell's fumble
items.summary: Tutu Atwell caught an 88-yard touchdown pass from Matthew Stafford with 1:33 to play, and the Los Angeles Rams rallied to end the Indianapolis Colts' unbeaten start to the season with a 27-20 victory Sunday.  Daniel Jones passed for 262 yards for the Colts (3-1), but Indy couldn’t overcome receiver Adonai Mitchell’s mind-boggling fumble right before he crossed the goal line with what was about to be a 76-yard touchdown reception in the third quarter.  The Colts also had a 53-yard rushing TD by Jonathan Taylor taken off the board by a holding call on Mitchell with 2:15 to play.
